(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (NNP Report)
      (CC and)
      (NNP Photos))
    (PP (IN by)
      (NP (NNP Joao)))))


root(ROOT-0, Report-1)
cc(Report-1, and-2)
conj(Report-1, Photos-3)
prep(Report-1, by-4)
pobj(by-4, Joao-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB recently))
    (VP (VBD had)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN pleasure))
        (PP (IN of)
          (S
            (VP (VBG being)
              (VP (VBD hosted)
                (PP (IN by)
                  (NP
                    (NP (NNP chef) (NNP Daniel) (NNP Sia))
                    (CC and)
                    (NP (PRP$ his) (NN team))))
                (PP (IN at)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT The) (NNP Disgruntled) (NNP Chef))
                    (PP (IN on)
                      (NP (NNP Dempsey) (NNP Hill)))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(had-3, I-1)
advmod(had-3, recently-2)
root(ROOT-0, had-3)
det(pleasure-5, the-4)
dobj(had-3, pleasure-5)
prep(pleasure-5, of-6)
auxpass(hosted-8, being-7)
pcomp(of-6, hosted-8)
prep(hosted-8, by-9)
nn(Sia-12, chef-10)
nn(Sia-12, Daniel-11)
pobj(by-9, Sia-12)
cc(Sia-12, and-13)
poss(team-15, his-14)
conj(Sia-12, team-15)
prep(hosted-8, at-16)
det(Chef-19, The-17)
nn(Chef-19, Disgruntled-18)
pobj(at-16, Chef-19)
prep(Chef-19, on-20)
nn(Hill-22, Dempsey-21)
pobj(on-20, Hill-22)

    (PP (IN in)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (JJ cheerful) (JJ little) (JJ colonial) (NN era) (NN one-storey))

          (WHNP (WDT that))
          (S
            (VP (VBD used)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB house)
                    (NP
                      (QP (DT no) (JJR more) (IN than) (CD four))
                      (JJ British) (JJ junior) (NNS officers)))))))
          (, ,))))))

  (S
    (SBAR
      (WHADVP (WRB How))
      (S
        (NP (DT the) (NN kitchen) (NN staff))
        (VP (VBP manage)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB peaceably)
                (NP
                  (NP (NN coexist))
                  (PP (IN in)
                    (NP (PRP$ their) (JJ tiny) (NN kitchen))))
                (PP (IN during)
                  (NP (DT the) (NN dinner) (NN rush)))))))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (PP (IN beyond)
        (NP (PRP me))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP do) (RB not)
        (VP (VB recommend)
          (ADVP (RB merely))
          (S
            (VP (VBG ordering)
              (NP (CD one) (JJ Small) (NN Plate))
              (PP (IN as)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT an) (NN appetizer))
                  (CC and)
                  (NP (CD one) (NNP Big) (NNP Plate))))
              (PP (IN as)
                (NP (PRP$ your) (JJ main) (NN course))))))))
    (: --)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (MD 'd)
        (VP (VB miss)
          (PRT (RP out))
          (PP (IN on)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN variety))
              (SBAR
                (WHNP (WDT that))
                (S
                  (VP (VBZ 's)
                    (PP (IN on)
                      (NP (NN offer)))
                    (ADVP (RB here))))))))))
    (. .)))

nn(Tel-9, Road-6)
nn(Tel-9, Singapore-7)
nn(Tel-9, 247693-8)
root(ROOT-0, Tel-9)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (CD 64765305) (NNS Tue))
    (: --)
    (NP (NNP Sun))
    (: :)))


num(Tue-2, 64765305-1)
root(ROOT-0, Tue-2)
dep(Tue-2, Sun-4)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (NP
      (NP (NNS 12pm))
      (: --)
      (NP (NNS 3pm))
      (, ,))))


root(ROOT-0, 12pm-1)
dep(12pm-1, 3pm-3)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (NNS 5pm))
    (: --)
    (NP
      (NP (CD 11.30) (NN pm) (NNP Closed))
      (PP (IN on)
        (NP (NNP Mondays)))
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (DT This))
          (VP (VBD was)
            (NP (DT an) (JJ invited) (NN review))))))))


root(ROOT-0, 5pm-1)
num(Closed-5, 11.30-3)
nn(Closed-5, pm-4)
dep(5pm-1, Closed-5)
prep(Closed-5, on-6)
pobj(on-6, Mondays-7)
nsubj(review-12, This-8)
cop(review-12, was-9)
det(review-12, an-10)
amod(review-12, invited-11)
rcmod(Closed-5, review-12)
